psdpj11.artifact.mining.name: Quickscorch
psdpj11.artifact.mining.desc2: mine but your tool will start
psdpj11.artifact.mining.lore1: This ornament stems from a world
psdpj11.artifact.mining.lore2: of immense heat and is said to
psdpj11.artifact.mining.lore3: have the ability to return to it.
psdpj11.artifact.size.name: Alpgrow
psdpj11.artifact.size.desc1: As you scale mountains, you grow
psdpj11.artifact.size.desc2: to their size. As you dive into
psdpj11.artifact.size.lore1: This ornament stems from a world
psdpj11.artifact.size.lore2: of the highest peaks and is said
psdpj11.artifact.size.lore3: to have the ability to return to it.
psdpj11.artifact.speedfood.name: Droughtstride
psdpj11.artifact.speedfood.lore1: This ornament stems from an everflat
psdpj11.artifact.speedfood.lore2: world and is said to have the
psdpj11.artifact.voidfall.name: Voidfall
psdpj11.artifact.voidfall.desc2: all your gear but you reappear
psdpj11.artifact.voidfall.desc3: high up in the sky unharmed.
psdpj11.artifact.voidfall.lore3: with the ability to return to them.
